candidates.title: Use clap for a nicer CLI

Evaluate using FxHashMap instead of HashMap
candidates.body:
Fixes:  #235 

### Summary of Changes
* Added the rust-c crate for FxHashMap
* Replaced all uses of HashMap with FxHashMap

 `cargo build` works but I cannot seem to run the tests. I did try installing the LLVM packages but maybe I missed some.
